thread.section_title: Dharma Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location and great stay
thread.title_full: Great location and great stay - Review of Dharma Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Timo E
title: Great location and great stay
text:
Hotel is very close to basically everything. Close to the train station and fairly centered in the city within about 15 minutes walking distance to many sights like the Trevi Fountain for example. Friendly staff. Very clean and nice room, we had a double bed plus a single bed for our daughter, the room was spacious and cozy.
Breakfast was served at the Cotto restaurant on the corner of the building and it was great. Good selection of breakfast foods, great coffee and very friendly service.
We loved our stay here and would definitely come here again!
